radio button

Radio button with description

Radio button with description

The following component is based on the from the USWDS. The information below shows how the component was customized to match our site brand. Please review the USWDS: Radio button with description for more information on how to use this component.

Contents:

  • Design
  • Description
  • Specifications
  • Code Examples
  • Jekyll Design File
Select one historical figure

Description

This variation of the radio button allows the addition of descriptive text along with the label and button. _Read more about radio buttons.

Specifications

field name field type class name required content rules example content notes
title h3 usa-radio true 80 characters Cats are really cool dudes
body text usa-radio__label true Run off table persian cat jump eat fish hack.
description text usa-checkbox__label-description Run off table persian cat jump eat fish hack. Paw at beetle and eat it before it gets away demand
